Mario escogió el programa auxiliar de enfermería porque esta tras un sueño de poder ser alguien, con la capacidad de ayudar a las personas que más lo necesita, porque le apasiona todo lo relacionado con la salud.  
En el tiempo que lleva haciendo las prácticas ha aprendido muchas cosas, y tal vez una de las más importantes es que la vida es lo más importante que se tiene, por medio de todos los pacientes que ha estado acompañado en la estadía en el hospital, ha perdido el miedo a hablar en público a expresarse, tener más confianza de sí mismo, a observar y hacer varias labores de enfermería. 
El proyecto de vida a corto plazo es terminar la carrera como auxiliar de enfermería, continuar los estudios en una universidad y poner en práctica todo lo que ha aprendido. A largo plazo Mario tiene la meta de hacer una especialidad y doctorado ya que es una persona amante del estudio.
En la parte familiar Mario quiere ser el apoyo y el guía de los hermanos, que ellos puedan ver en el muchas cosas buenas, que los padres se sientan orgullosos de él y lo que más desea Mario es poder compartir todos los momentos de felicidad con la familia, la razón más importante de la vida.
En lo personal Mario con la ayuda de la familia a construido una base firme en valores y ética, en un futuro seguirá siendo la persona que es, educada, responsable con los compromisos y llena de muchos valores.
texts.en:
Mario Alberto enrolled in the Nursing Assistance Program at Campo Alto nursing school and is currently doing an internship at Hospital San Carlos. He is currently starting his fourth semester while completing this internship. He has been very responsible in all of his commitments, and he has done very well in his written tests. He also enjoys what he is learning.

His family includes five siblings, and he is the third. His mother, who is the head of household, has always supported him, which is why he is requesting the benefit of the Kiva program, so that he can finance his fourth semester on his own. Mario chose the Nursing Assistance Program because he is following his dream of becoming someone capable of helping the people who need it the most, and he is passionate about everything related to healthcare.

He has learned a lot during his time as an intern, and perhaps one of the most significant things he has learned is that life is the most important thing we have. By working with patients through their hospital stay, he has not only learned how to observe and carry out nursing duties, but also overcome his fear of public speaking and gained self-confidence. 

His short-term goals in life are to earn his degree as a Nursing Assistant, move on to university, and put everything he has learned into practice. Mario's long-term goal is to study a specialty and do a doctorate, because he loves studying.

Regarding his family life, Mario wants to support and guide his siblings. He wants to be a role model for them and to make his parents proud. And what Mario desires most of all is to be able to share every happy moment with family, which is the most important thing in life.

As a person, Mario has a solid ethical and moral base, which he built with the help of his family. In the future he will continue to be the person that he is: polite, responsible in his commitments, and with a lot of principles.

loans.use: to pay for one semester's tuition.

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en: Asmaa was born in 1971. She is married and a mother of seven. She lives in a sector in Jordan called southern Ghour. Asmaa has been trying her best to support her husband in covering their children's needs by selling different products such as home products and cosmetic products for the past two years. She is planning to expand her project to open her own store in the future. Now she seeks a loan to buy a larger quantity of home products and cosmetics in order to raise her sales and profit.

loans.use: To buy more home products and cosmetics for her business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad was born in 1989. He is married and a father of seven. Mohammad has been working in agriculture and raising goats to sell their products for 15 years. His work is his only source of income, which is helping him in cover his children's needs. Now Mohammad needs to add more variety to his plants in order to raise his productivity. So he needs to buy new types of seeds. But he doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy new types of seeds for his business

loans.name: Nadira

texts.en: Nadira was born in 1960. She is a married woman living in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Wihdat with her husband who works as a carpenter. Nadira noticed the financial crisis her husband was facing. So she decided to help him improve their living conditions by selling blankets to her neighbors and friends for the last six years. She is planning now to expand her project and her sales by buying a larger quantity of blankets and adding bed sheets to her sales. but she doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more blankets and bed sheets for her business

loans.name: Hilda Amalia

texts.es: Hilda de 40 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos quienes estudian actualmente, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta y elaboración de piñatas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee clientela establecida que la buscan por los buenos precios y la calidad de los productos, Hilda esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de los materiales necesarios para elaborar las piñatas como: cartón, papel de todo tipo y colores, alambre, pegamentos, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo y así tener junto a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hilda is a 40-year-old single mother who lives in her own home. She has two children who are currently in school.

Hilda has been making and selling piñatas for several years. Her business is located in her home. She has established customers who are looking for good prices and the quality of the products. Hilda is requesting a loan in order to buy needed materials for making the piñatas such as cardboard, paper in all types and colors, wire, glue, and other items. This will allow her to continue her work so that she and her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cardboard, paper in all types and colors, wire, glue, and other supplies.

loans.name: Mayra Del Carmen

texts.es: Mayra tiene 22 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de Managua. Soltera, estudia en una de las universidades de la ciudad. Su principal meta es poner en práctica los conocimientos adquiridos después de finalizar su carrera. Solicita el crédito para pagar su curso de titulación y título profesional. El crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que con su título podrá tener mejores oportunidades de trabajo y lograra desempeñarse como profesional. Su plan futuro es trabajar en una empresa de alto prestigio, así como seguir adquiriendo más conocimientos de acuerdo a su carrera.
texts.en:
Mayra is 22 years old and is originally from the city of Managua.  She is single and studying at one of the local universities.  Her main goal is to put her knowledge to use after finishing her degree.

She is asking for a loan to pay for her class and her professional degree.  The loan will help her a lot since with her degree she will be able to have better work opportunities and will be able to develop herself as a professional.

Her plans for the future include working for a well-known company as well as continually gaining more knowledge related to her profession.

loans.use: pay for her class and her professional degree.

loans.name: Saleema

texts.en: Saleema was born in 1963. She is married and has three sons. Her husband is a retired man. Saleema has been trying to support her husband financially by selling shoes for nine years from a room in her house. Her project has been profitable for her. So she is planning to expand it by opening her own independent store in the future. Now she is planning to add accessories to her sales in order to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To add accessories to her business

loans.name: Ebtisam

texts.en: Ebtisam was born in 1965. She is a widow and a mother of 3 living in a sector in Jordan called Zarqaa. Ebtisam has been concentrating on covering her children's needs and providing them with the best education. She noticed the financial crisis she faced after her husband's death. So, she decided to run her project of selling clothes and blankets.  She has been doing this for the past two years and found it profitable. Now Ebtisam is out of products so she needs to buy more clothes and blankets to sell. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and blankets for her business

loans.name: Lania

texts.en: Lania was born in 1980. She is married and a mother of four living in a sector in Jordan called Wihdat. Lania has been trying to support her husband financially after she noticed the financial crisis he is facing by selling clothes, stationary tools, and cosmetics for the past year. She is planning to open her own independent store in the future. Now she is seeking a loan to buy more cosmetic products to respond to her customers' requests.

loans.use: To buy more cosmetic products for her business

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is 27 years old, and lives in Taiz, Yemen. He is the sole provider for the family. He is a soldier, getting a low salary. He said he faces a difficult situation, because his income is not enough to cover his big family's needs. He has a small house and he is well-known in his surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

He intends to renovate his house. He is requesting a loan of YER 100,000 from Al-Amal, with which to buy construction supplies. He will use them for renovating his house. He believes that this loan will positively improve his life. He hopes to be able to provide for his family’s needs and to provide them with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to use for renovating his house.

loans.name: Zohor

texts.en:
Zohor is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo. 

Zohor is a 42-year-old married woman from Rafah city. She is a mother of two sons and three daughters. Her husband works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a very low income. This income barely covers the family's needs. Zohor and her husband work on their land where they plant seasonal fruits and vegetables. They use green houses to ensure a good quality of their crops. 

Zohor and her husband would like to improve the farm. Zohor took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy fertilizer and seedlings. By taking this loan, Zohor and her husband will be able to improve their farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Shalom Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado “Shalom” está en el 2do ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Este comité es de la Ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso,  las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas, no solo en lo económico, sino también como personas.
Una de las señoras Adriana mostró en su encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza un nivel rojo, pero con las capacitaciones que viene  realizando, también por medio de la venta de artículos varios que hace como arroz, fideos, jabones, edulcorantes, golosinas y demás, y sumado al constante apoyo de las compañeras está saliendo adelante y anhela en el futuro agrandar su producción y diversificar los productos ofertados. Espera un futuro mejor para sus hijos es por eso que redobla esfuerzos en pos de su ideal. 
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar arroz, fideos, jabones, edulcorantes, golosinas y demás para poder venderlos y seguir mejorando sus ventas.
texts.en:
The group Shalom is in its second cycle within the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other get ahead. This committee is from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. Its members have set the growth of each one of them as their main goal, not only regarding financial growth, but personal as well.

Adriana is one of the women in this group. Her poverty elimination survey showed that she was in the 'red level', but she is getting ahead thanks to the trainings she has been doing, and also by selling assorted products like rice, pasta, soap, sweetener, sweets, and other items. Her fellow members' unconditional support has also helped her, and in the future she hopes to increase production and diversify the products she offers. She wants a better future for her children, which is why she doubles her efforts in pursuing her ideal.

She is requesting this loan so that she can buy rice, pasta, soap, sweetener, sweets, and other items in order to sell them and keep improving her sales.

loans.use: to buy rice, pasta, soap, sweetener, sweets, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 25-year-old single man from Rafah city. He lives with his family in a small simple house. For the past six years, Mohammad has been working in a business renting wedding and event supplies like chairs, tables and decorations. It is a good business but with a non-stable income due to the decrease in the numbers of parties and events during the winter.

Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more chairs and tables for his business. By taking this loan, Mohammad's income will be increased and his business will be improved. 

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more chairs and tables for his business.

loans.name: Odai

texts.en: Odai is 24 years old. He lives in an area of Jordan called Irbid with his parents and five siblings. Odai is a university student majoring in Electrical Engineering. He is in his 3rd year. He is planning to work in his study field after graduation in order to support his family financially. But he doesn't have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees. Because of that, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Khitam

texts.en:
Khitam is a conservative woman, so she asked her son to appear in the photo instead.

Khitam has five sons and daughters; her oldest is Tareq who appears in the photo. Tareq is a 19-year-old single guy who is a university student majoring in Electrical Engineering. Khitam is applying for this loan to support her son in his studies and pay his semester fees to give him the opportunity to work in his study field after graduation.

loans.use: to pay her son's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Samah

texts.en:
Samah is 37 years old and the mother of four children, working to ensure a bright future for her family. She has a successful daycare which needs renovations in order to expand. 

Before opening her business several years ago, Samah researched and looked into the need for a daycare in her village. At first, she opened with just two children and now her daycare has expanded and the need for her services continues to grow. 

Samah needed to renew the toys and make renovations to her daycare, including a new divider wall to separate play areas and the nap time area.

Samah needed this loan to purchase garden toys and educational games, renovate a new entrance, and make renovations to the daycare.

Samah manages her business to ensure that she will be able send all of her children to study for an advanced degree. She and her husband are dedicated to making a good life for their family.

loans.use: to purchase garden toys and educational games, renovate a new entrance, and make renovations to the daycare.

loans.name: Mamadou Diop

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou est âgé de 42 ans, il est marié et père de famille qui habite à 7km  du guichet. Il est photographe de profession et a une expérience de plus de 10ans dans cette activité. Il gère les charges des dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille qui est composée d’une femme et de 2 enfants  et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Il sollicite ce prêt d’un montant de 250.000F pour acheter un appareil photo pour satisfaire ses  clients. Il commence sa journée à 18h pour la finir à 23h du soir. A l’avenir, il souhaiterait grâce aux crédits de l’institution, ouvrir un autre studio et augmenter ses revenus afin de mieux améliorer les conditions de vie de sa petite famille.
texts.en:
Mamadou is a 42-year-old married father who lives 7 km from his shop. He is a photographer by profession and has more than 10 years of experience in this business. He handles the daily household expenses and school fees of his family, which includes his wife and two children.

He is requesting a loan in the amount of 250,000 XOF to buy a camera to satisfy the needs of his clients. He starts his workday at 6:00 PM and ends at 11:00 PM. In the future and with the help of loans from this credit institution, he would like like open another studio and increase his revenues to improve his little family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a camera for photography.

loans.name: Kholoud

texts.en: Kholoud is a conservative woman, so she asked her stepchild to take her place in the picture. Kholoud was born in 1976. She is widowed and lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with her three children and stepchildren. Mustafa, Kholoud's stepchild who is appearing in the photo, is a university student majoring in agriculture. He is in his fourth year and is one step closer to graduation.  Kholoud is requesting a loan to pay for Mustafa's upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: To pay for her stepchild's upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anas

texts.en:
Anas was born in 1989. He is single and lives in an area of Jordan called Southern Ghour with his parents and five siblings. Anas noticed the financial crisis his family is facing. So he decided to start supporting them by selling home products and perfumes. He started his project five years ago selling a small amount of his products and started to expand it gradually. 

Now he needs to buy more perfumes and home products in addition to adding cosmetics to his project in order to respond to his customers' requests and raise his sales. But he doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, he has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more home products and perfumes and add cosmetics to his business.

loans.name: Kahraman

texts.en:
Kahraman was born in 1960. She is widowed and lives in Amman, Jordan, with her five children. Kahraman has been working with flowers and trees in addition to coordinating brides' and bridesmaids' bouquets. 

She is planning to expand her project in the future by opening her own independent store. Now Kahraman is requesting a loan to buy artificial flowers and fabrics to raise her productivity and respond to her customers' requests.

loans.use: to buy artificial flowers and fabrics for her business.

loans.name: Elham

texts.en:
Elham was born in 1958. She is married and a mother of seven. Elham has been sewing clothes for eight years. She started her project as a hobby. Then she decided to make it a source of income in order to support her husband financially. 

She is planning to open her own sewing workshop in the future. Now she needs to buy more fabric and thread to raise her productivity and to respond to her customers' requests. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more fabric and thread.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 26-year-old man who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He has a shop selling basic grocery products in a small public area. He started his business by saving an amount in order to open a general store. His business is a source of income and profit. 

Recently, he would like to expand his business but the wholesalers hesitate to provide him with the required goods, dealing with him as a lower class person, which has become a challenge for him. In spite of that, he was able to buy enough goods to stock his shop as usual but he could not buy all the items he had before as he needs financial support. 

So, he applied for a loan of 450,000 YER from AMB in order to buy grocery items such as soft drinks, mineral water, etc. for his business. This loan will help to meet the demand of his clientele, bringing in all that they require. In the future, he hopes to purchase a small vehicle to use to transport materials for his business from the market easily in order to improve his profit.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as soft drinks and mineral water for his business.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepción es un señor de 67 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, hace más de 30 años empezó con una pequeña despensa en su casa, vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, así también compra animales para faenarlos y luego vender la carne en la despensa. Actualmente es el centro de compras más importante y concurrido de la zona.
Ahora desea comprar más productos como ser: bebidas y artículos de primera necesidad como:   Harina, yerba, fideos y arroz en cantidad, y de esa forma seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Esta agradecido por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Concepción is a 67-year-old gentleman who's single and doesn't have children. He started his business over 30 years ago with a small grocery store in his home. He sells all kinds of products that are household staples. He also buys animals for fattening and then sells their meat at his store. It is currently the most important and busiest store in the area.
Right now he wishes to purchase more merchandise such as beverages and products that are household staples (such as flour, yerba mate, noodles and rice) in bulk. That way he'll move forward with his sales, as he has been doing. He's grateful for having the opportunity to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase beverages and products that are household staples (such as flour, yerba mate, noodles and rice) in bulk.

loans.name: Cristy Jean

texts.en:
Cristy Jean wants to improve her living situation in the future. She studies at a university taking classes in Business Administration. She has five siblings and is still dependent on her parents. She is determined to finish her course in order to gain a better job and wants to help her siblings to provide them with a better education in the future.
 
She joined GDMPC and took a loan to pay her tuition fees. She is quite thankful to GDMPC for being a part of her journey.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 39 years old, married, and has three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She operates a charcoal business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for six years. She earns additional income from selling rice.

Marissa requested her thirteenth loan from NWTF for 25,000 PHP, which she will use to buy additional sacks of charcoal for her business. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for her business
